t: Eco Terra Mattress Review: Our Unbiased Review
s: With its natural design, the Eco Terra doesnt have any synthetic foam that emits the volatile organic compounds (VOCs) involved in off-gassing. Brand-new latex can have a rubbery smell, but its far from overpowering.
